page.title: 14RECREATION FORRES EAST
page.content: Recreation caters for all ages and tastes. The area offers indoor and outdoor activities. The {Forres {Community Centre }offers many sports like {Badminton, Squash.}Also available in the Forres Squash Club, { {Basketball, Indoor Hockey }and { {football, marshall arts }and { {archery.}Less energetic activities are {ceramics, pool, table tennis, {photography }and {wood work classes.} Attached to the community centre is the public library which caters for all ages. Of interest is the {Falconer {Museum.}Other indoor persuits include{ {swimming and bowls }at{Forres {Academy.}Outdoors is the magnificent {Grant Park}Venue of local cricket, football, highland games, fun fairs and a childrens'play park. Close to the park is the {Forres Municiple Golf {Course.}
